sentences.sContent: the small gap between top amateurs and pros in golf
sentences.sCn: 顶级业余高尔夫球手和职业选手之间的微小差距

phrases.pCn: 无偿的；为了公益；为慈善机构和穷人提供的免费专业服务
（拉丁）补偿物；相等物；交换条件；让步条件

trans.tranCn: 〔相对于业余爱好者而言的〕专业人士，职业人员〔尤指职业运动员〕
trans.tranOther: someone who is paid to do something, especially play a sport, that other people do for pleasure
paid to do something, especially play a sport, that other people do for pleasure
if you are pro an idea, suggestion etc, you support it
